name: PaperModels
description:
Features of the game:

- Minimalistic design.

- Unique and non-linear gameplay.

- Each time you restart the level from the beginning, the parts of the model are shuffled randomly.

- More than 60 models cut into pieces by hand.

- Models are dedicated to various topics:

  • geometric figures
  • letters / numbers
  • kitchen
  • construction / renovation
  • aviation

- Musical accompaniment in the game, consists of more than 20 musical compositions.

- No time or scoring, just play without fuss.

PaperModels Demo (Android)
